title: Ghost icon in Pixel 5 home screen.
content:
Sometimes while moving an app in the home screen a "ghost image" of an icon will get stuck in the home screen, usually while using a folder. It can not be interacted. The image disappear if I reset the device. This has happened a lot. Here is a video to show you what I mean https://youtu.be/Oyr9N7ocLHw
If I press the icon it will ignore the image an press what is below it.

How can I fix/report this?
